title: Oceanfront property for sale
location: 18/5 Rodrigo Avenue, off Galpotta Road, Matara
details:
52 perch, Freehold and clear title, beachfront land located in a cliff in Gandara, Matara is available for sale. Land has a wider beachfront and a lager reservation with a rock formation, including a natural pool in front of the property. Less than 1 km from Matara-Tangalle road
Rs 450,000/= per perch
